title: Channel Islands National Park: Visitor Services List
body: Visitor Services List         Â     Businesses holding concession contracts, commercial use authorizations, and special use permits are authorized by the National Park Service to provide specific commercial visitor services in Channel Islands National Park.   Concessioners  Visitor Convenience Merchandise at Robert J. Lagomarsino Visitor Center    Western National Parks Association 12880 Vistoso Village Drive Tucson, AZ 85737 wnpa.org     Boat Transportation    Island Packers, Corporation 1691 Spinnaker Dr., Suite 105-B Ventura, CA 93001 (805) 642-1393 islandpackers.com     Air Transportation (Fixed wing air taxi service to Santa Rosa Island only)    Channel Islands Aviation 305 Durley Avenue Camarillo, CA 93010 (805) 987-1301 www.flycia.com      Commercial Use Operators  Multi-day, Live Aboard Excursions    Truth Aquatics, Inc. 301 West Cabrillo Blvd. Santa Barbara, CA 93101 (805) 963-3564 www.truthaquatics.com      Kayak Guide and Outfitting Services Scorpion Area, Eastern Santa Cruz Island    Channel Islands Outfitters 117 B Harbor Way Santa Barbara, CA 93109 (805) 899-4925 info@channelislandso.com www.channelislandso.com     Aquasports 111 Verona Ave. Goleta, CA 93117 (800) 773-2309 or (805) 968-7231 www.islandkayaking.com   Santa Barbara Adventure Company 720 Bond Ave. Santa Barbara, CA 93103 (805) 884-9283 letsgo@sbadventureco.com www.sbadventureco.com/adventures/channel-islands/        Kayak Guide and Outfitting Services All Areas (Exclusive of Scorpion Area, Eastern Santa Cruz Island)   Channel Islands Kayak Center 3600 Harbor Blvd. Suite 213 #539 Oxnard, CA 93035 (805) 984-9985 www.cikayak.com   Channel Islands Outfitters 117 B Harbor Way Santa Barbara, CA 93109 (805) 899-4925 info@channelislandso.com www.channelislandso.com   Santa Barbara Adventure Company 720 Bond Ave. Santa Barbara, CA 93103 (805) 884-9283 letsgo@sbadventureco.com www.sbadventureco.com/adventures/channel-islands/   Aquasports 111 Verona Ave. Goleta, CA 93117 (800) 773-2309 or (805) 968-7231 www.islandkayaking.com     Vessel Supported, Non-Landing, Kayak Guide and Outfitting Services    A & M Events 3600 Harbor Blvd. P.O. Box 219 Oxnard, CA 93035 (805) 204-0977 andyvolaski@gmail.com www.blueoceankayaking.com      Sightseeing, Whalewatching, and Vessel Supported Kayaking in cooperation with authorized kayak guide companies    "Explorer" Captain Tony Volaski (805) 646-0836      Sailing Tours    Sail Channel Islands "Sancerre" (805) 750-7828 www.sailchannelislands.com      Educational Activities, Guided Hiking, and Camping    Channel Islands Outfitters 117 B Harbor Way Santa Barbara, CA 93109 (805) 899-4925 info@channelislandso.com www.channelislandso.com   Santa Barbara Adventure Company 720 Bond Ave. Santa Barbara, CA 93103 (805) 884-9283 letsgo@sbadventureco.com www.sbadventureco.com/adventures/channel-islands/   Aquasports 111 Verona Ave. Goleta, CA 93117 (800) 773-2309 or (805) 968-7231 www.islandkayaking.com   Alpine Training Services 417 B W. Foothill Blvd. #528 Glendora, CA 91741 (626) 824-4005 www.alpinets.com   SOAR (Success Oriented Achievement Realized) P.O. Box 388 Balsoam, NC 28707 (828) 456-3435 www.soarnc.org      Special Use Permit Operators (Educational Institutions and Non-Profit Organizations Providing Services)  Educational Activities, Guided Hiking, and Camping    Boojum Institute P.O. Box 711 Pioneertown, CA 92268 (760) 228-2311 www.boojum.org   The Dunn School P.O. Box 98 Los Olivos, CA 93441 (805) 686-6471 www.dunnschool.org   Wilderness Inquiry 808 14th Ave. Minneapolis, MN 55414 (612) 676-9409 www.wildernessinquiry.org   WOLF Adventures 29395 Agoura Road Agoura Hills, CA 91301 (310) 455-4157 www.wolfadventures.org
